Name: Bystander
About the game: Bystander is an opportunity to become an agent for tracking the network during totalitarianism. Your task is to search among other people's correspondence on the network those that contradict the current laws, copies of which you will receive by fax. Follow the new laws, look for the hidden meaning in each phrase and, of course, report violations!

Meta Description: Looking for information on Bystander? Check out the release date (Dec 15, 2017), developer insights from Egor Magurin, and a complete game summary.
